intro.description: A remote agent is required on a device in order to communicate with Carbide while debugging. Follow the steps below to learn how to download and install the latest remote agent for your target device.

item.title: Select a remote connection
item.description: In the Remote Connections view select the connection setting used to communicate with the remote device.

subitem.label: Right-click the connection setting used to communicate with the device and select Edit Connection Settings.
Click Next to open the Settings page.

item.title: Select the appropriate remote agent
item.description: Choose the remote agent that matches the OS on the target device.

subitem.label: In the remote agents list, select the remote agent that most closely matches the OS on the target device.
Click Save to download and save the remote agent for installation later. This step is optional as the immediate installation step below is recommended.
Click Install to download and immediately install the selected remote agent to the target device.
